lead_paragraph: Darin Ruf hit a two-run homer in the first inning to help the Phillies beat the Pittsburgh Pirates 4-2 on Tuesday.

headline.main: Ruf Hits 2-Run Homer as Phillies Beat Pirates 4-2
headline.print_headline: Ruf Hits 2-Run Homer as Phillies Beat Pirates 4-2

snippet: Darin Ruf hit a two-run homer in the first inning to help the Phillies beat the Pittsburgh Pirates 4-2 on Tuesday.
